title: Varbase Components/Atoms/Progress Bar
desc: Documentation and examples for using Bootstrap custom progress bars featuring support for stacked bars, animated backgrounds, and text labels.

color.name: Progress Bar Color
color.description: Use background utility classes to change the appearance of individual progress bars.

striped.name: Striped
striped.description: Add `.progress-bar-striped` to any `.progress-bar` to apply a stripe via CSS gradient over the background color.

animated.name: Animated
animated.description: The striped gradient can also be animated. Add `.progress-bar-animated` to `.progress-bar` to animate the stripes right to left via CSS3 animations.

label.name: Label
label.description: Add labels to your progress bars by placing text within the `.progress-bar`.

percent.name: Percent
percent.description: The percentage of the progress between 1 to 100.

message.name: Message
message.description: A string containing information to be displayed.

args.label: Progress Bar Label
args.message: More information about this progress bar.
